sheet_title: (N) ADU Floor Plan w/ Schedules & Elect.
description: New ADU floor plan with electrical layout, window schedule, door schedule, electrical symbols legend, 1-hour fire rated wall detail, egress standards, plumbing fixture notes, and smoke/CO alarm requirements. This is the primary architectural plan for the ADU interior layout.
key_content: Window schedule: 6'-0" x 4' tempered glass vinyl slider, 4'-0" x 4' vinyl slider (contractor to verify all openings)
Door schedule: 3'-0" x 6'-8" wood entry door w/ security lock, 3'-0" x 6'-8" wood french door, 2'-8" x 6'-8" wood bedroom door w/ privacy lock
Bedroom egress: min 5.7 sq.ft. net clear opening, 24" min height, 20" min width, 44" max sill height
1 HR fire rated exterior wall: 16" OC studs, Type X gypsum board (5/8"), insulation, stucco exterior
Plumbing fixtures: lavatory faucet 1.2 GPM, kitchen faucet 1.8 GPM, showerhead 1.8 GPM, toilet 1.28 GPF (HET)
Smoke & CO alarms: hardwired with battery backup, interconnected, in each sleeping room and vicinity
Electrical: GFCI in kitchen/bath, AFCI for bedroom circuits, dedicated circuits for dishwasher/disposal/microwave/refrigerator
Exhaust fan: Energy Star rated, ceiling mounted, drip CFM min ventilation
Dryer exhaust: rigid metal duct terminated to exterior
NOT SHOWN: window U-factor and SHGC values
NOT SHOWN: total ADU interior square footage on this sheet
NOT SHOWN: range hood CFM specification
